title: Skateboards
description: Skateboards provides students with a unique view into the world of skateboarding. Students will learn what skateboards are, how to stay safe while riding, and where people (and dogs!) like to skateboard. Detailed photographs and high-frequency words support emergent readers. Students will also learn about main idea and details, as well as asking and answering questions, to better understand the text.
meta: contests, helmets, pads, ride, skateboard, tricks
Ask and answer questions to better understand the text
Main Idea and Details : Identify the main idea and supporting details in a text
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /o/ sound
Prepositions : Recognize and use simple prepositions
